title: Got Pulsefire Ezreal in the mystery gift, but not the icon.
body: I got Pulsefire Ezreal in the mystery gift from Riot. The icon doesn't show up, even when I log back in. Do we get the icon if we're gifted Pulsefire Ezreal?

replies.body:
Yes, you should. :(

It's on your account now.

I did not receive it as well. :(
I submitted a ticket, hopefully it will be fixed. :)
got the pulsefire ezreal tx riot:) but not the icon can i still get it?

Hi guys,

Please submit a ticket to Riot at http://support.leagueoflegends.com and they'll be able to add this to your account as Hollymonster did above :-)

hey Lukirus,

If Hollymonster doesn't notice this, write in a support ticket!
This happened to me too, I don't have an icon :(
This also happened to me :( and I don't have the icon :(
